name: birdclub.
description:
Game made for "A Game By Its Cover 2020" game jam. Famicase chosen - "bird club."

Build a variety of feeders and houses to attract a diverse collection of birds to your backyard! Some birds only appear during certain seasons, while others prefer certain types of food! Some birds are extra rare! Can you record them all?

(I obviously missed the game jam submission and did my best to just make it playable)

Gameplay:

Explore, find interesting places and objects, use tools, create bird houses, take photos of birds, detect them using radio signals, and collect images of birds in your journal!

Controls:

WASD - movement
Space - jump
Shift - sprint
Ctrl - crouch
F - use objects
Z, X, C, V - tools
Left Click - action
Right Click - toggle zoom (camera mode)
Mouse - look around

(some controller inputs are also mapped,
not all so use at your own risk)

Author notes:

Although the game is just a prototype, you can report any bugs, if this ever gets anything updated!
